casebody.data:
In the Matter of Consolidated Edison Company of New York, Inc., Respondent, v Walter Hoffman et al., Constituting the Zoning Board of Appeals of the Village of Buchanan, Appellants. Hudson River Fisherman’s Association, Intervenor-Respondent. Submitted January 3, 1977; decided February 10, 1977

Reported below, 54 AD2d 761.

Motion to dismiss the appeal herein granted and appeal dismissed, with costs and $20 costs of motion, upon the grounds that appellants are not aggrieved by the modification at the Appellate Division and no substantial constitutional question is directly involved (CPLR 5601, subd [a], par [iii]; subd [b], par 1).
